alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 2:25AM CDT until June 26 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cumberland County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Crossville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crossville, Fairfield Glade, Crab Orchard, Lake Tansi and Cumberland Mountain State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 319 and 339. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
